title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files do not appear in the File menu Most Recently Used (MRU) list.
EB: The MRU file list should be persisted between sessions.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the software.
2. Open a few files.
3. Close the software.
4. Re-open the software and check the File menu MRU list.
